channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Binance, CEO Changpeng Zhao intends to seek dismissal of CFTC complaint
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Binance, Changpeng Zhao and former compliance chief Samuel Lim intend to file two motions to dismiss a March lawsuit from the CFTC.

item.title: OpenAI shutters AI detector due to low accuracy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: OpenAI has quietly pulled the plug on its AI Classifier because of its low accuracy.

item.title: Crypto investors cool on Bitcoin funds, turning to Ether and XRP
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Bitcoin-related funds saw outflows of $13 million over the past week, reversing five weeks of bullish inflows, according to Coinshares analyst James Butterfill.

item.title: Connext, Alchemix launch cross-chain token standard to reduce bridge exploit losses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The two protocols will implement a standard for issuers to control the “canonical” minting of tokens, helping to reduce losses from unofficial bridges.

item.title: Arkham Intel Exchange approves $5K bounty for info on Do Kwon and Terra wallets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Terra co-founder Do Kwon is currently in a Montenegrin prison as the platform remains under scrutiny in South Korea, but crypto users continue to seek out information on wallets.

item.title: Worldcoin launch raises eyebrows as WLD price notches a double-digit gain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond
item.description: Worldcoin price soared to $3.58 shortly after launching but traders and crypto advocates have many concerns.

item.title: Two more crypto bills in the US: Law Decoded, July 17–24
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Last week was marked by two new legislative initiatives for the crypto industry in the United States.

item.title: 3 reasons why Maker (MKR) fundamentals hint at further price upside
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: MKR looks primed to continue the rally given its recent buyback mechanism and two other key metrics that impact Maker’s price.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Twitter vs. Threads: Users are the real losers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Caria Wei
item.description: The world’s eyes turned in excitement to the battle between Elon Musk's Twitter and Mark Zuckerberg's Threads, but users emerged as the real losers.

item.title: US GAO says lack of interagency cooperation needs to be addressed in crypto regulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: In a report requested by Rep. Maxine Waters, the country’s top watchdog is carefully neutral but dissatisfied with agencies’ abilities to work together.

item.title: Proposed gag order in SBF’s criminal case under review, citing attempt to ‘influence public opinion’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The proposal followed a complaint filed by U.S. authorities alleging Sam Bankman-Fried had leaked Caroline Ellison’s private journals in an attempt to interfere with the trial.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market down
is crypto in a bear market
when will bitcoin price go up
item.description: Bitcoin price is down today as investors expect the Federal Reserve to raise rates and crypto whales send record amounts of BTC to exchanges.

item.title: Price analysis 7/24: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin is at the pivotal 50-day SMA support, and a drop below this level could result in accelerated selling of BTC and altcoins.

item.title: New research shows how brain-like computers could revolutionize blockchain and AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: A CMOS-compatible neuromorphic computing chip could be on the horizon thanks to breakthrough research out of Technische Universität Dresden.

item.title: Ripple ruling and crypto ETFs ‘drove a lot of urgency’ among lawmakers, reportedly says Coinbase CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong reportedly said Representatives Maxine Waters and Patrick McHenry were both considering a legislative path forward on regulating digital assets.

item.title: Why is XRP price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is XRP price down today
item.description: XRP price is down today, like other top crypto assets, as traders anticipate a Federal Reserve rate hike this week.

item.title: Bitcoin whale exchange inflow share hits 1-year high — over 40%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin whales account for the most exchange inflows volumewise since June 2022 as short-term holders become increasingly active.

item.title: What criminal charges for Celsius ex-CEO mean for crypto industry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The former CEO of the troubled crypto lender faces multiple charges of fraud and market manipulation as U.S. regulators eye crypto market overhaul.

item.title: Coinbase vs SEC court dates confirmed for initial case arguments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A judge in New York has approved a joint request from the SEC and Coinbase to settle dates for opening briefs and all subsequent responses.

item.title: Worldcoin launch divides opinions — Crypto community has its say
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: “What could go wrong?” Decentralized ID protocol Worldcoin has launched, receiving mixed reactions from the cryptocurrency community.

item.title: Putin signs law on introduction of digital ruble in Russia
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Russian citizens will not be forced to use the digital ruble, and use of the CBDC will be a voluntary choice for people to make, the governor of the Bank of Russia said.

item.title: XRP court ruling marks milestone, but new crypto law could take years
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Ripple’s partial victory against the SEC is positive, but crypto firms still face uncertainty without a regulatory framework.

item.title: Worldcoin token launch sparks response from Vitalik Buterin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Ethereum co-founder released a long-form response to the launch of Worldcoin’s decentralized human identity verification system.

item.title: From rugs to riches: UK carpet retailer to adopt Bitcoin standard
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: With U.K. inflation running high and sluggish banking interest rates, small businesses are turning to novel solutions to save money.

item.title: History of Python programming language
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Delve into the remarkable evolution of Python, and learn how it grew to become a prominent and beloved programming language in the tech world.

item.title: Korean banks research stablecoin, CBDC alternative
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Hana Bank plans to research certificates of deposit tokens, while Woori Bank’s research department has recently released a report on the tokens.

item.title: Biggest mining difficulty drop of 2023? 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin begins to fulfill traders’ downside targets as BTC price action retraces its steps in a crucial macro week.

item.title: Twitter bids adieu to Bluebird as Elon Musk rebrands platform to X
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Musk said in a recent interview that if done right, X has the potential to become half of the global financial system.

item.title: Bitcoin block 800,000 mined — What’s next?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Tick tock, next block. The Bitcoin network passed block 800,000 with less than a year to go to the next block reward halving.
